Package org.jetel.util.bytes

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CloverBufferAllocator
    This class represents factorization utility, which would be used in case we would have several implementations of CloverBuffer.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ByteBufferUtils
    This class provides static methods for working with ByteBuffer in association with Channels
    ByteCharBuffer
    ByteCharBuffer This class represents a character buffer that can seamlessly read characters from underlying byte source (file) and decode them using a CharsetDecoder.
    ByteCharBuffer.ByteCharPosition
    ByteCharPosition This class represents a position of a character in input (file).
    CloverBuffer
    This class is substitution for originally very intensive using of ByteBuffer class.
    DynamicCloverBuffer
    This class is only implementation of CloverBuffer, at least for now.
    DynamicCloverBufferAllocator
    Buffer allocator for DynamicCloverBuffer.
    LogOutByteChannel
    Wrapper for WritableByteChannel, which is created above Log.
    PackedDecimal  
    ReadableByteChannelIterator
    Readable byte channel iterator class.
    RestrictedByteArrayOutputStream
    Support for the port writing.
    SystemOutByteChannel
    Wrapper for WritableByteChannel, which is created above System.out Use this wrapper instenad of Channels.newChannel(System.out) to avoid System.out.close()
    UTF8CloverBufferReader
    A UTF-8 CloverBuffer reader.
    UTF8CloverBufferWriter
    A UTF-8 java.nio.ByteBuffer writer.
    WritableByteChannelIterator
    Channel iterator class.
